title: Ford delays Android Automotive, confirms 2022 models (including F-150 Lightning) can’t be upgraded
content:
One of Google’s biggest partners for Android Automotive in the US market is Ford, but the carmaker has just announced that its transition to its Android system is well behind schedule and will be delayed by a few months.

more…

The post Ford delays Android Automotive, confirms 2022 models (including F-150 Lightning) can’t be upgraded appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Ford has confirmed that it will delay its Android Automotive system to late 2023, and that existing vehicles won't get an upgrade.
